title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy a cloud-based software solution on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) that enables nonprofit client to upload, store, and manage their datasets securely and efficiently
Implement data ingestion pipelines that automate the process of dataset uploads, ensuring data is processed, cleaned, and stored in the correct formats for analysis within GCP
Leverage GCP tools (e.g., BigQuery, Looker Studio) to perform data analysis according to client requirements and generate interactive, user-friendly visualisations of key metrics and insights

Work closely with nonprofit clients to gather and define requirements, translating their needs into technical solutions for data analysis and visualisation, ensuring the software meets their specific goals
Provide client training on how to use the software effectively, including uploading datasets, interpreting data visualisations, and using the analytics features

title: Software Developer (iOS)
responsibilities: Leveraged native iOS frameworks and APIs, including Core Data, XCTest, URLSession, and MapKit, to enhance application functionality and user experience
Improved the performance of the application by refactoring and optimising the code-base
Designed and implemented unit tests using the XCTest framework, ensuring robust and reliable application performance

title: Game Developer
responsibilities: Developed Landmarks game using Unity Game Engine, C#, and MapBox
Established the application framework by integrating MapBox with Unity Game Engine
Coordinated with other developers and concept artists to materialise the prototype

title: Associate Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained SaaS application using Java and React.js
Wrote unit tests and unit testable code to identify and eliminate bugs
Coordinated with co-workers to provide on-time delivery of the product in an agile environment
Worked with Product Owners to refine user stories
